    • Uses of SharedState in api

      Methods in api that return SharedState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SharedState SharedState.update(SharedState newState)
      Called when two states need to be compared.
      Methods in api with parameters of type SharedState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Result<R> Task.call(SharedState currentState, ComputerCallback<R> callback)
      Called by Computer to execute this task
      void Space.setJob(Task<R> task, SharedState initialState)
      Sets the job of the space to specified task
      void Space.setJob(Task<R> task, SharedState initialState, Scheduler<R> customScheduler)
      Sets the job of the space to specified task
      void Scheduler.start(SharedState initialState, Map<Integer,Proxy<R>> proxies, BlockingQueue<Result<R>> solutions, BlockingQueue<Exception> exceptions)
      Start the scheduler on the space WARNING: Should not be blocking, start any blocking process in new thread
      SharedState SharedState.update(SharedState newState)
      Called when two states need to be compared.
      void Space.updateState(int originatorID, SharedState state)
      Update the shared state on this space
      void Task.updateState(SharedState updatedState)
      Updates the known state in the executing task
      void Scheduler.updateState(SharedState state)
      Called by Space when the state has been updated, can be used by scheduler to take action
      void ComputerCallback.updateState(SharedState state)
      Called by Tasks to update state on parent Computer
      void Proxy.updateState(SharedState updatedState, boolean force)
      Update the state on the attached Computer
      void Computer.updateState(SharedState state, boolean force)
      Update Shared State on Computer Computer may choose whic stat eto keep, unless force parameter set to true
